question: How can I register in the application?
answer: You can register using your Google account or by entering your first name, last name, date of birth, email address, and password. The password must be strong and repeated in an additional field. If you use email and password, you must complete a captcha.

question: How do I log in to the application?
answer: You can log in using your Google account or with your email address and password. The credentials must match a registered user.

question: Do I need to be registered to see the available movies?
answer: No, any user can view the list of movies along with their rating, categories, and genre. You can also filter them by genre, subtitles, and format (2D/3D).

question: What information can I see about a specific movie?
answer: You will be able to see the poster, title, rating, reviews, and synopsis. If you are authenticated, you will also have the option to book tickets if there is availability.

question: How do I book tickets for a movie?
answer: You must be authenticated. You can select multiple tickets, choose available seats and showtimes. The system will show you the end time of the selected movie.

question: Where can I see my booking history?
answer: In your profile, you will be able to see all your previous bookings. You can cancel a booking at least one day in advance and you will receive an email notification. Each booking shows movies, quantities, total amount, and associated products.

question: Is it mandatory to pay for a booking in advance?
answer: Yes, bookings cannot be registered without payment. You can choose the payment method and you will receive an email notification in case of success or error.

question: How can I leave a review for a movie?
answer: Only authenticated users who have booked and watched the movie can leave a review. At least 4 hours must have passed since the movie ended. The system will send an email requesting your review.

question: What can an administrator do with movies?
answer: An administrator can add new movies or modify existing ones. They must enter the title, description, and image. The changes are reflected immediately if the required fields are completed.

question: What can an administrator do with food products?
answer: They can add new products by entering the name, description, price, category, and image, or modify existing ones. The changes are reflected immediately if the required fields are completed.

question: What information does an administrator see on the dashboard?
answer: The administrator can view the total number of non-administrator users, the total number of tickets sold, and the number of food products sold. The counters are automatically updated and visible upon entering the dashboard.
